fatal-error-page.info: The application cannot be loaded at the moment. Please reload the page or try again later.
form.stepper.station.label: Choose station
form.stepper.station.label.explanation: Search for a station or select one on the map
form.stepper.interval.label: Choose time resolution
form.stepper.interval.label.explanation: The higher the resolution, the less data is available from the past.
form.stepper.interval.label.tooltip: 10-minute values are available from 2004, hourly values from 1981 and daily and monthly values go back in part to 1864 and 1750 respectively.

form.stepper.selection-review.label: Your selection
form.stepper.selection-review.label.expl: You will receive a file containing all parameters available for this station.
form.stepper.download.label: Download the data
form.time-range.recent.tooltip: Contains the data of the previous year until the end of February
form.time-range.historical.explanation: All values up to the end of the previous year
form.time-range.label: Choose time period
form.station.selection-info.no-station-s: Select a station on the map
form.station.search.label: Station
form.parameter.search.label: Parameter
form.measurement-data-type.normal.explan: Measured values of all parameters of a station
form.measurement-data-type.homogenous.ex: Consistent and checked data from a climate station. Recommended for climate analyses
form.download.terms: The Open Data from MeteoSwiss may be used without restriction; the source must be cited when reproducing or redistributing ("Source: MeteoSwiss")
form.download.parameters-explanation: Parameter abbreviations with description, time interval, unit of measurement, etc.
form.download.stations-explanation: Station abbreviations with name, coordinates, altitude, etc.
form.download.inventory-explanation: List of all stations and parameters with start and end date of the measurements
form.download.download-programmatically-: Information on how you can obtain data automatically
